name: My Talking Virtual Cat Emma
description:
Talking animals and virtual pet games have received a new member! VIRTUAL CAT EMMA is a talking pet so cute it WILL MAKE YOUR HEART MELT! Get it & enjoy!

Some might say that this virtual pet game is like any other talking cat app. You have a talking animal you need to feed, bathe and take care of. When your virtual pet is well rested, you can also play mini games for kids. Not wrong, but not entirely true either. Virtual cat Emma is nothing like any other talking animal. Even if you are not a fan of virtual pets games, you will make an exception for this one and this is why:

◉ FEATURES OF EMMA THE CAT - VIRTUAL PET: ◉

◈ Once you adopt a virtual pet, you can give this talking animal a name you like
◈ Virtual cat is by definition a talking animal, which means you can listen to your kitty cat talking back to you
◈ Emma will grow as you take care of her; your virtual friend will even get a birthday cake
◈ Be careful: if you don't pay attention to your virtual pet, the kitty cat will get sick
◈ Pet nail salon – play nail art games and make your talking cat pretty
◈ Cool makeup - use awesome eyeshadow, lipstick and blush to make Emma even more beautiful
◈ Stickers with Emma - make your chat with friends more fun
◈ Watch Emma chase her tail and have fun
◈ Get hypnotized by Emma and enjoy
◈ Teeth brushing time – keep the teeth of your talking animal clean and healthy
◈ Play the violin – become a master at playing violin
◈ Dress up games – you can customize everything in this talking cat game just the way you like
◈ Coloring spree – a special coloring section with the most popular coloring pages and pictures to color
◈ Mini cat games – many kitty games for kids that help improve concentration, hand to eye coordination and memory
◈ Counting sheep – or mice, whenever kitty cat can't fall asleep
◈ Share alike – if you want to show your talking friend to the world, you can easily share screenshots or achievements on many social networks

◉ (VIRTUAL) CAT vs (VIRTUAL) DOG ◉

Ever since there is humanity, there have been discussions about which pet is better: cat or dog. Since you can hardly have both (they do not always like each other that much), you have to make a choice. Why do that? Just get yourself a virtual cat or virtual dog (or both!) and your real pet, if you have one, will not be jealous. Virtual pets games have many advantages and this is one of them. Emma The Cat - Virtual Pet will be a great choice if you feel like playing with a virtual cat. Mini games for kids inside this talking cat app will amaze you. Don't pay attention to the fact that this is a kids game. The adults are only grown up children. If you are a parent, you'll have an extra reason to download this cat talking game. Virtual pet Emma is waiting to win your heart! Don't let this cute little virtual cat wait for too long!

◉ ENTERTAINMENT FOR SMALL AND BIG KIDS ◉

There are many who have enjoyed playing My Talking Kitty Cat game or My Talking Dog Charlie. Cat that talks Emma is a new face but not less popular. Virtual cat games and talking animals have always been great entertainment not only for kids, but for adults, too. When you hear this cat talking back to you in a funny voice, it will definitely make you laugh your heart out no matter the age.
Even Sigmund Freud said that time spent with cats is never wasted time. So get on it! Play with Emma The Cat - Virtual Pet and have fun!

Emma The Cat - Virtual Pet is a free game and it's an intellectual property of Peaksel.
